text: Acestrorhynchus pantaneiro, known commonly as the pike characin,Common names of Acestrorhynchus pantaneiro at www.fishbase.org. is a species of fish in the family Acestrorhynchidae. It was described by Naércio Aquino de Menezes in 1992. It inhabits the La Plata, Paraná, Paraguay, Uruguay, and Mamoré Rivers. It reaches a maximum total length of , and a maximum weight of . A. pantaneiro feeds on bony fish.Food items reported for Acestrorhynchus pantaneiro at www.fishbase.org. It is harvested by commercial fisheries. ==References== Category:Acestrorhynchidae Category:Fish described in 1992
title: Acestrorhynchus pantaneiro
